title: Home - Riccardo Riva
first-post-intro: Photography is much more than just a shot: it’s a gaze, a moment that becomes a story. With this blog I want to explore the techniques, the tools, and above all the emotions and stories hidden behind every image. A starting point to share the passion for light, details, and the beauty of stopping time.
about_p1: I'm a photographer and videographer based in Italy. I have worked with several local clients and gained experience as an in-house photographer for a local company. I love capturing the beauty of everyday life through my lens — whether it's a sweeping landscape, a candid moment, or a carefully composed portrait.
about_p2: This site is a work in progress; I will add more information about my background and projects soon. Stay tuned!
contact_intro: Have a project in mind or just want to say hello? I'd love to hear from you.
contact_thanks: Thank you — I will get back to you soon.
